_source.short_desc: Powerfront's INSIDE gives agents the most visually appealing live chat console to create an operator that promotes performance.
_source.long_desc: Powerfront's INSIDE gives agents the most visually appealing live chat console that uses avatars to create an operator experience that is engaging, intuitive and promotes performance. See the customer's online journey, shopping history, provide product recommendations, engage in video product demonstrations and more. With proactive chat, live chat, video chat and chatbot assistants, agents can be effective in increasing conversion rates and optimizing productivity.
_source.target_audience: Luxury fashion, beauty, jewellery, government, utilities and telecoms, automotive, hospitality and travel, financial institutions, universities, electronics, and any organization who prioritizes CX.

category_features.name: Canned Responses
category_features.definition: Shortcuts for inputting frequently used messages

category_features.name: Customizable Branding
category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Geotargeting
category_features.definition: Geographic location of visitors determines behavior of the software

category_features.name: Offline Form
category_features.definition: Form to collect visitor contact information when live chat isn't available

category_features.name: Proactive Chat
category_features.definition: Copy on the page or chat window encouraging the user to engage with the chat option

category_features.name: Screen Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share screen view with others

category_features.name: Third Party Integrations
category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

category_features.name: Transfers/Routing
category_features.definition: Transfer chats and organize messages between agents

category_features.name: Website Visitor Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor activity of individuals who visit your website using cookies

category_features.name: Chatbot
category_features.definition: AI program that learns to perform repetitive data-driven actions such as content or product recommendation, chat automation, etc.

category_features.name: Code-free Development
category_features.definition: Assemble applications and bots from pre-made building blocks without having to write software code or knowing a programming language

category_features.name: Contextual Guidance
category_features.definition: Interprets what a user is doing based on context and helps guide them through the process.

category_features.name: For Developers
category_features.definition: For the intention to be used by developers

category_features.name: Intent Recognition
category_features.definition: Helps understand a user's intentions/actions

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Communication
category_features.definition: Allows support from multiple channels including email, live chat, phone, and social media.

category_features.name: Multi-Language
category_features.definition: Recognize and support multiple languages/dialects

category_features.name: Pre-Configured Bot
category_features.definition: Bot template that exists within the system. Does not require any customization to use.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Sentiment Analysis
category_features.definition: Categorize emotions expressed in written text and identify if they are positive, negative or neutral

category_features.name: Speech Recognition
category_features.definition: Train your system to interpret and transcribe voice messages

category_features.name: Speech Synthesis
category_features.definition: The ability of a bot to respond to user queries in synthesised voice

category_features.name: Community Management
category_features.definition: Enable students, customers or employees to engage with each other in a particular space online or offline

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Behavioral Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyse user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Import and export information and reports to and from the program

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: System notifications about the need to bump priority level of ticket

category_features.name: Appointment Management
category_features.definition: Schedule, change or cancel appointments

category_features.name: Call Center Management
category_features.definition: Manage all call center activities including call monitoring, call recording, call answering, call transfer, etc.

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Sort and organize large volumes of inbound emails.

category_features.name: Knowledge Base Management
category_features.definition: Create, store and share information, data, and support articles in a centralized database

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Queue Management
category_features.definition: Monitor wait time and abandonment for incoming requests that have not been routed

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Social Media Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Virtual Assistant
category_features.definition: AI program that learns to perform repetitive data-driven actions such as content or product recommendation, chat automation, etc.

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Canned Responses
category_features.definition: Shortcuts for inputting frequently used messages

category_features.name: Data Recovery
category_features.definition: Ability to restore deleted, hidden, or lost data from an email server/system

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.name: Queue Management
category_features.definition: Monitor wait time and abandonment for incoming requests that have not been routed

category_features.name: Response Management
category_features.definition: Track status and remediate problems in a centralized way

category_features.name: Routing
category_features.definition: Provide directions and plan the day?s work to optimize employee scheduling

category_features.name: Shared Inboxes
category_features.definition: An email inbox that can be accessed and managed by multiple individuals

category_features.name: Signature Management
category_features.definition: Add and maintain centralized email signature(s) across an organization

category_features.name: Spam Blocker
category_features.definition: Ability to prevent junk or spam messages from entering the system?s main inbox

category_features.name: Whitelisting/Blacklisting
category_features.definition: Control system access and/or deliverability for applications and email addresses

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Regulate who can view and use the system by setting permissions and issuing passwords

category_features.name: Audience Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyze viewership/audience metrics

category_features.name: Audience Engagement
category_features.definition: Tools to engage with viewers (e.g. commenting, chat room, polling, Q&A)

category_features.name: Customizable Branding
category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Event Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan an event's time and location

category_features.name: Live Streaming Production
category_features.definition: Incorporate media other than video (PDFs, images, titles and more) into live streaming

category_features.name: Moderation
category_features.definition: Controls/tools to moderate the session

category_features.name: Multiple Camera Feeds
category_features.definition: Live stream is able to support multiple cameras

category_features.name: Multistreaming
category_features.definition: Stream to multiple platforms simultaneously

category_features.name: Performance Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitoring and measurement of relevant metrics to assess the performance of IT resources

category_features.name: Session Recording
category_features.definition: Record live streaming sessions for future use

category_features.name: Split/Multi-Screen
category_features.definition: Split the screen or display multiple presenters

category_features.name: Video Monetization Tools
category_features.definition: Allow users to live stream from your platform for a fee

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that?s quick to implement and easy to use.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that's quick to implement and easy to use. It lets you deliver real time, conversational support on web, mobile, and in apps-like WhatsApp. Pair it seamlessly with Zendesk's customer support solution to reduce customer wait times and increase efficiency. Response times can be as fast as 30 seconds and agent performance can improve by 25% after switching to Zendesk.

related_products.short_desc: Engage visitors to your website 24/7 with Pipedrive's Chatbot and Live Chat. Turn your window shoppers into qualified leads.
related_products.features: Turn your website window shoppers into qualified leads with Pipedrive's Chatbot and Live Chat. Chatbot engages your website visitors 24/7. Easily customize your bot's look, the questions it asks and how it replies. Have available sales reps add a human touch with Live Chat from their phones or desktop. If your team gets busy, Chatbot steps in so no leads slip away. Both tools are available in the LeadBooster add-on, which can be added to any Pipedrive CRM plan. Start your 14-day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho Desk embeddable live chat widgets for your customer service team. Now you can support your customers through your website & apps.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution from Zoho. Key features include management of customer support tickets, support portal, contract management & report creation. With Zoho Desk's embeddable live chat widgets make instant responses for instant happiness. Your customers can get in touch with your agents instantly, right from the help center with contextual AI, so your agents can respond and help them find answers faster. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations.

related_products.short_desc: LiveChat lets existing and prospective customers talk to your company via your website and give them a personal experience in real time
related_products.features: LiveChat is a live chat application that can be integrated into your website to capture more leads and close more sales. Having LiveChat on your website means that on-site visitors can send you their questions and receive answers in no time.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured help desk and live-chat Software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. 

Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
related_products.features: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools for personalized live chat at scale. Chat with customers in your product, app and on your website and manage conversations in a next-generation Inbox that's easy to set up and use. Plus, leverage a full suite of customer communication tools for sales, marketing and support to engage customers with proactive outbound messaging, interactive product tours and more.

related_products.short_desc: Userlike is the first and only live chat software to help your business win and nurture customers across messaging channels.
related_products.features:
Userlike combines website chat with mobile messaging.

Switch to a better method of customer communication. For your customers, support agents, sales reps and managers. 

Chat with your customers via your website, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and SMS. Connect your chatbot and automate parts of your customer interactions. 

Born and hosted in Germany. Userlike keeps your and your customers' data safe with a 100% GDPR-compliant communication solution.

related_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
related_products.features:
Service Cloud, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee from the contact center to the field with the innovative tools. Embed real-time support on your website and in your apps with Chat. 
Start personalized live chats, in-app or online, with your customers based on how they're using your site. Deliver chat around the globe with multilingual support. And scale your customer support with AI-powered chatbots that help answer routine asks.

related_products.short_desc: #1 free live chat and contact center software used by over 8 million companies. Also comes with free CRM and email marketing.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free live chat software for your website, you'll love Bitrix24. First of all, free actually means free ? you can have as many chat sessions as you need, without limitations. Second, we don't limit free edition to a single chat agent ? you get twelve chat agents free of charge. Third, Bitrix24 is a fully featured omnichannel contact center.

related_products.short_desc: Webchat enables you to convert more website visitors into customers and deliver remarkable customer support through live chat
related_products.features:
Birdeye Webchat enables you to capture and convert leads from your website. We allow you to talk to
customers in real-time, use a chatbot to automate responses to frequently asked questions, or if you are busy, text them back when you have a moment. A single unified inbox allows you to manage all customer
conversations in one place. Reporting helps you track the number of active conversations, measure and
compare agent productivity, average resolution time, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Beautiful Live chat solution with CRM and Help Desk integration and powerful reporting capabilities. GDPR Ready and Accessible. API.
related_products.features:
Olark Live Chat is the easiest way to add live chat to your website. 
Over 40,000 organizations including small businesses, large businesses, non-profits, government entities, and higher education choose Olark. 

Add an Olark chat box to your site and start helping more customers and closing more sales. Olark integrates with a number of CRM, eCommerce and Help Desk platforms to provide you with automation, chatbots, and key customer insights.

GDPR Ready, WCAG 2.1 AA Accessible, and NIST 800-53

similar_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
similar_products.features: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools for personalized live chat at scale. Chat with customers in your product, app and on your website and manage conversations in a next-generation Inbox that's easy to set up and use. Plus, leverage a full suite of customer communication tools for sales, marketing and support to engage customers with proactive outbound messaging, interactive product tours and more.

It lets you deliver real time, conversational support on web, mobile, and in apps-like WhatsApp. Pair it seamlessly with Zendesk's customer support solution to reduce customer wait times and increase efficiency. Response times can be as fast as 30 seconds and agent performance can improve by 25% after switching to Zendesk.

similar_products.short_desc: 3CX Live Chat is a free live chat solution that offers extra calling capabilities and team communication features at no cost
similar_products.features: 3CX Live Chat is a free live chat solution with extra calling capabilities and team communication features added at no cost. Resolve issues faster through chat and voice. Visitors can chat, call or video call at the touch of a button without dialing numbers. Forward chats with history to agents or groups. Answer messages remotely with free mobile phone apps. Integrate Business Facebook messages and SMS to answer all communications from the same interface. No per user per month fees!

similar_products.short_desc: Multi-Company Live Chat Software, Secure, Reliable Customer Engagement & Real-Time Customer Support.
similar_products.features:
Vision Helpdesk's Live Chat Software is a secure, real-time multi-company live chat messaging platform that improves customer engagement by helping sales teams to convert website visitors into paying customer

Key Aspects of Live Chat Software -
* User-Friendliness 
* In-Built into Customer Support tools 
* Multi-Company Live Chat Management 
* Device-Independent (Browser-based) 
* Enhance Customer Support Team's productivity 
* Engage Website Visitors to Increase Sales.
* Powerful Automation

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Desk embeddable live chat widgets for your customer service team. Now you can support your customers through your website & apps.
similar_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution from Zoho. Key features include management of customer support tickets, support portal, contract management & report creation. With Zoho Desk's embeddable live chat widgets make instant responses for instant happiness. Your customers can get in touch with your agents instantly, right from the help center with contextual AI, so your agents can respond and help them find answers faster. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations.

similar_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
similar_products.features:
Service Cloud, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee from the contact center to the field with the innovative tools. Embed real-time support on your website and in your apps with Chat. 
Start personalized live chats, in-app or online, with your customers based on how they're using your site. Deliver chat around the globe with multilingual support. And scale your customer support with AI-powered chatbots that help answer routine asks.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshchat is a modern messaging software built for customer engagement teams to talk to customers across channels.
similar_products.features:
Freshchat is the modern messaging solution that delivers effortless customer service for the digital-first customer by bringing together artificial and human intelligence across messaging channels.

With the world moving towards contactless service, customers expect on-demand, personalised support on familiar channels that are easily accessible.

This is where businesses use Freshchat's powerful messaging platform to service their customers on various digital channels using a blend of automation

similar_products.short_desc: Ada is an easy to use customer support automation platform.
similar_products.features: As the market leader in Automated Customer Experience (ACX), Ada personalizes customer engagement by putting the power of AI in the hands of the people who know your business best. With Ada, it's simple for non-technical teams to build an automated, enterprise-class chatbot platform that solves 70%+ of customer inquiries.

similar_products.short_desc: Inbenta Messenger module is an omnichannel ticketing and live chat solution that centralizes and speeds up case management using AI.
similar_products.features:
Inbenta Messenger is an omnichannel ticketing and live chat solution that converts all social media, website, and email contacts into a manageable queue. 

This helps agents handle tickets effortlessly from a single platform. 

Additionally, with its AI technology, it is able to smartly prioritize cases and suggest content in real-time to help agents answer questions in a single click. This reduces waiting and average handling times, leading to overall better customer service.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho SalesIQ is an all-in-one customer engagement, live chat and analytics platform that provides great customer experience.
similar_products.features: Zoho SalesIQ is an all-in-one customer engagement platform that provides live chat software, visitor tracking, AI bots (with code and codeless), audio calling, and more. Using SalesIQ helps unify the efforts of your marketing, sales, and customer support teams, providing a great customer experience and boosting business growth. Get to know your prospects better and increase your sales conversion now.

similar_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
similar_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured help desk and live-chat Software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. 

Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

similar_products.short_desc: Tidio is a customer service platform that combines live chat and chatbots to improve customer support and generate more sales.
similar_products.features: Tidio combines live chat and chatbots in one tool, so you can delight your customers and improve your sales. It enables you to engage your visitors in real time, send personalized messages, and offer assistance via chatbots, anytime you are busy. Additionally, it connects to Messenger, Instagram, and email, so you can manage all communication channels from one place. Tidio is available on desktop and mobile, so you can answer messages on the go, from every device.

similar_products.short_desc: LiveChat lets existing and prospective customers talk to your company via your website and give them a personal experience in real time
similar_products.features: LiveChat is a live chat application that can be integrated into your website to capture more leads and close more sales. Having LiveChat on your website means that on-site visitors can send you their questions and receive answers in no time.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Enablement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Enablement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Enablement covers content and communication tools that help sales teams show off product information to prospective customers, engage potential leads, and overall boost sales team performance. These solutions align sales with marketing to ensure that the sales team gets the most up to date materials. Sales Enablement software includes presentation tools and gamification applications, as well as collaborative content editing and sharing solutions.

_source.short_desc: Powerfront's INSIDE is an omni-channel customer service software that replicates in-person experiences online seamlessly.
_source.long_desc:
Make online shopping as personalized as in store with INSIDE, an omni channel customer service software that provides agents with the tools and data to replicate in-person shopping experiences online and seamlessly between channels. 

Some of the world's leading brands use INSIDE to earn on average a 25-35%, sometimes 48%, conversion rate using the enterprise live chat, chatbots, video-assisted personal shopping and live-streaming solutions
_source.target_audience: Luxury fashion, beauty, jewellery, government, utilities and telecoms, automotive, hospitality and travel, financial institutions, universities, electronics, and any organization who prioritizes CX.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer support solution.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer support solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features: LiveAgent enables you to harness the power of a fully-featured analytics package that gives you powerful data analysis and reporting tools. Quickly analyze how effective your customer service is by segmenting data by a customer service agent or by type of interaction. Discover 175+ help desk features including gamification features and a built-in CRM. With LiveAgent, providing world-class customer service is easy. Start your free trial today, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
related_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Userlike is the first and only live chat software to help your business win and nurture customers across messaging channels.
related_products.features:
Website chat and mobile messaging are the customer channels with the highest customer satisfaction. With Userlike, you can serve them all.

Chat with your customers via your website, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and SMS. Connect your chatbot and automate parts of your customer interactions. 

Born and hosted in Germany. Userlike keeps your and your customers' data safe with a 100% GDPR-compliant communication solution.

related_products.short_desc: Don't just send another boring feedback survey: Typeform makes feedback fun with beautiful, interactive forms.
related_products.features: What if giving feedback could be fun for your customers, while you get better data? Sound too good to be true? Meet Typeform: beautiful, responsive forms that you can customize to your brand. When the form feels friendlier, customers will open up more. Then send the feedback automatically wherever you need it with 120+ integrations to your favorite apps. All with zero code.

related_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM is the best customer satisfaction software to help you manage your customers' information and satisfaction.
related_products.features: monday sales CRM is the best customer satisfaction software to help you manage your customers' information and satisfaction. Digitize your forms and turn responses into workflows easily with monday.com's no-code platform. Create your forms in minutes, and embed your form anywhere or share a link to get customer feedback instantly. Compile all your responses into a simple and visual board, analyze your replies, get insights, and break it down by a multitude of different parameters.

related_products.short_desc: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business.
related_products.features: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business. From the first phone call to the final invoice and every touchpoint in between, Weave connects the entire customer journey. Weave's software solutions transform how local businesses attract, communicate with and engage customers to grow their business.

related_products.short_desc: Swell helps you keep a pulse on your customers and earn glowing reviews that grow your business.
related_products.features: Swell helps local businesses provide seamless customer experiences, tap into customer sentiment trends and insights, and harness the testimonials of happy customers to fuel growth. It helps simplify your customer feedback loop with automatic review and survey invite text messages. By giving you actionable insights into customer satisfaction, you can adapt and improve. Ultimately Swell empowers you to use reviews to stand out online and grow your business.

related_products.short_desc: Collect immediate customer feedback with Nicereply. Use one-click CSAT, CES & NPS surveys & increase the volume of insights you receive
related_products.features:
Nicereply CX = The effortless way to champion customer experience
Teams at companies like Microsoft, Lenovo, and Hubspot use Nicereply to: 
- collect immediate feedback
- use one-click CSAT, CES & NPS surveys 
- measure feedback per agent, team, country, or the entire company
- customize surveys in terms of branding, questions, and scales
- increase survey response rates by 200%
- benefit from multiple survey distribution options 
- choose from a variety of integrations & more

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer support solution.
similar_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer support solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
similar_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

similar_products.short_desc: Swell helps you keep a pulse on your customers and earn glowing reviews that grow your business.
similar_products.features: Swell helps local businesses provide seamless customer experiences, tap into customer sentiment trends and insights, and harness the testimonials of happy customers to fuel growth. It helps simplify your customer feedback loop with automatic review and survey invite text messages. By giving you actionable insights into customer satisfaction, you can adapt and improve. Ultimately Swell empowers you to use reviews to stand out online and grow your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Increase your overall customer satisfaction with Momentive by identifying areas of improvement after key customer interactions. With our purpose-built CSAT programs, you can measure customer satisfaction (CSAT) score in real time across multiple channels, tie it to specific products, services, or processes, and enable your teams to respond to feedback fast by triggering follow-up actions. Contact us to learn about a tailored CSAT program for your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Delightfully easy to use one-click satisfaction surveys for service minded professionals.
similar_products.features:
Simplesat is the fun and easy way to collect CSAT, CES (Customer Effort Score, and NPS (Net Promoter Score) feedback. Collect customer satisfaction directly through ConnectWise, Zendesk, Autotask, Salesforce, Freshdesk, HubSpot, or any other helpdesk. You can also add and send the customer survey on your email signature, or send it directly from Simplesat.

All your feedback ends up in one place - making it easy to analyze and take action!

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: pulseM is the #1 review management platform for home services. Instantly manage interactions and generate leads from any device.
similar_products.features: pulseM is the #1 review management platform built for home services. Instantly manage customer service interactions, automate customer feedback, and address issues in real-time from any device. Turn customer reviews into your competitive advantage with pulseM. Request a demo to get started today!

similar_products.short_desc: Lightweight customer satisfaction software for online products and services
similar_products.features: Lightweight customer satisfaction software for online products and services. Capture and track experiences and feedback in all critical moments of the customer journey. Collect website feedback, product experience, customer service satisfaction, and track NPS. Easy to start with, quick to deliver value, powerful when needed. One-click native integrations with your everyday tools. Comes with real-time support and fair pricing.

similar_products.short_desc: Keatext helps you easily analyze and build a 360-degree view of your customer feedback to understand what drives customer satisfaction.
similar_products.features:
Understanding how customers feel and what drives behavior at each step of the customer journey is difficult.

With Keatext, you can easily build a 360-degree view of your customer feedback to understand what drives NPS in surveys, star ratings in reviews, or problems in support tickets - all in one platform.

Reduce your analysis time by 98% and improve CX with our innovative AI, seamless integration with apps like Zendesk and Surveymonkey, interactive dashboards, and shareable reports!

similar_products.short_desc: Wonderflow predictive AI makes sense of all types of customer feedback to help you be successful in competitive markets.
similar_products.features:
Millions of product reviews are written every day. Wonderflow is the simplest AI-based solution to analyze them and turn this extremely vast stream of customer feedback into winning decisions.

Wonderflow Unified VoC Analytics help B2C companies extract value from consumer feedback like online reviews, support center records, and NPS.

**Wonderflow is tailored to consumer electronics, insurance, logistics, tyres, and cosmetics enterprises.**

similar_products.short_desc: Canny is a user feedback tool built to cover everything you need to navigate the entire feedback cycle.
similar_products.features:
Capture, organize, and analyze user feedback in one place to inform your product decisions. 

Prioritize feedback, build a roadmap, and close the communication loop with a built-in changelog.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Complaint Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Complaint Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Complaint Management software helps to track, organize and resolve customer complaints and maximizes the productivity of the employees who deal with customers directly. These solutions are characterized by the ability to accurately capture, classify and route complaints, enabling communication across the team and insuring compliance. Complaint Management software is related to Customer Satisfaction software, Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Loyalty software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Loyalty tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: With Customer Loyalty software, companies can strengthen relationships with their customers in a number of different ways. Gift cards, points and rewards programs, email updates, incentives, VIP programs and more can all help create a loyal customer base. Directories related to Customer Loyalty software are Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Service software, Marketing Automation software and Public Relations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.
